#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;

const int MOD = 1000000007;
long long dp[1005][1005];

int main(){
    int m,n,p,i,j;
    memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
    cin>>m>>n>>p;
    if(m==1&&n==1&&!p)
    {
cout<<"1"<<endl;
exit(0);
    }
    while(p--){
        cin>>i>>j;
        dp[i-1][j-1]=0;
    }
    if(dp[0][0]==0){
        cout<<"0\n";
        exit(0);
    }
    dp[0][0]=0;
    for(i=1;i<m;i++){
            if(i==1){
                if(dp[i][0]==0) continue;
                else dp[i][0]=1;
            }
            else{
                if(dp[i][0]==0) continue;
                else dp[i][0]=dp[i-1][0];
            }
    }
    for(i=1;i<n;i++){
            if(i==1){
                if(dp[0][i]==0) continue;
                else dp[0][i]=1;
            }
            else{
                if(dp[0][i]==0) continue;
                else dp[0][i]=dp[0][i-1];
            }
    }
    /*cout<<"dp\n";
    for(i=0;i<m;i++){
        for(j=0;j<n;j++){
            cout<<dp[i][j]<<" ";
        }
        cout<<"\n";
    }*/
    for(i=1;i<m;i++){
        for(j=1;j<n;j++){
            if(dp[i][j]==0) continue;
            else{
                dp[i][j]=(dp[i-1][j]%MOD+dp[i][j-1]%MOD)%MOD;
            }
        }
    }
    /*cout<<"dp\n";
    for(i=0;i<m;i++){
        for(j=0;j<n;j++){
            cout<<dp[i][j]<<" ";
        }
        cout<<"\n";
    }*/
    cout<<dp[m-1][n-1]%MOD<<"\n";
return 0;
}
